comments:
OS: SLES 9 (GTK) Korean
JDK: IBM JDK 1.4.2
IES: I20060322_1335

In the test case "Test.UI.FrameworkEditors.1 - Overview Page", it says:

"After a TPTP test finished runing.... Test Log Viewer opens with the Overview page as the first page.... Click on a slice of the pie should bring the list of that particular type of verdict on the right in 'Verdict List' section...."

When I clicked on any slices of the pie, nothing happens on the "Verdict List" section. And the error log is as the following:
